alert_text.description:
Unable to run selected area capture on this website. Please use full screen recording or try another website.

(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
alert_text.message:
Haiwezi kukimbia eneo la kuchaguliwa kwenye tovuti hii. Tafadhali tumia rekodi kamili ya skrini au jaribu tovuti nyingine. 

 (╯ ° □ °) ╯( ┻━┻.

editor_drag_and_drop.message: Drag na kuacha picha / gif au

editor_frame_selector_apply_edits.description: Apply Edits to Selected (WARNING: Can not be undone)
editor_frame_selector_apply_edits.message: Tumia mabadiliko ya kuchaguliwa (Onyo: Haiwezi kufutwa)

editor_image_copied_failed.description: Failed to copy image to clipboard, it may be too large.
editor_image_copied_failed.message: Imeshindwa nakala ya picha kwenye clipboard, inaweza kuwa kubwa mno.

editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.description: You have reached the max recording length time of $maxlength$ seconds for GIFs. Premium users can update this from the settings page.
editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.message: Umefikia urefu wa kurekodi wa muda wa sekunde za $maxlength$ kwa GIFs. Watumiaji wa premium wanaweza kusasisha hii kutoka kwa ukurasa wa Mipangilio.

editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.description: GIFs are intended for short recordings. If you require full length videos we recommend our free screen recorder:
editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.message: GIF zimekusudiwa kwa rekodi fupi. Ikiwa unahitaji video za urefu kamili tunapendekeza rekodi yetu ya bure ya skrini:

editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.description: Premium users can update this from the settings page.
editor_max_time_reached_dialog_descripti.message: Watumiaji wa premium wanaweza kusasisha hii kutoka kwa ukurasa wa Mipangilio.

editor_save_dialog_compress_tooltip.description: Apply GIF compression algorthm to greatly reduce GIF file size and in some cases improve quality. Highly recommeded.
editor_save_dialog_compress_tooltip.message: Omba algorthm ya compression ya GIF kupunguza sana saizi ya faili ya GIF na katika hali zingine kuboresha ubora. Imependekezwa sana.

editor_save_dialog_dither_tooltip.description: Apply dither algorithm to frames. Try toggling this option if you experience color quality issues.
editor_save_dialog_dither_tooltip.message: Omba algorithm ya dither kwa picha. Jaribu kuweka chaguo hili ikiwa unapata maswala ya ubora wa rangi.

editor_save_dialog_frames_alert.description: There are currently selected frames, saving will only output these selected frames -
editor_save_dialog_frames_alert.message: Hivi sasa kuna picha zilizochaguliwa, kuokoa kutatoa tu muafaka huu uliochaguliwa -

editor_save_dialog_frames_alert_button.description: Click here to unselect all frames

editor_save_dialog_processing_alert.description: Processing this recording will require a lot of memory and processing power. Unless you have a high spec PC it is recommended to do one or more of the following:
editor_save_dialog_processing_alert.message: Usindikaji kurekodi hii itahitaji mengi ya kumbukumbu na usindikaji nguvu. Isipokuwa una PC maalum inashauriwa kufanya moja au zaidi ya yafuatayo:

editor_save_dialog_processing_alert_memo.description: Please note if the resulting GIF is blank then you ran out of memory.
editor_save_dialog_processing_alert_memo.message: Tafadhali kumbuka ikiwa gif inayotokana ni tupu basi ulipoteza kumbukumbu.

editor_save_dialog_reduce_width_tooltip.description: Reduce GIF width and height/quality to improve processing time and produce a smaller file.
editor_save_dialog_reduce_width_tooltip.message: Punguza upana wa GIF na urefu/ubora ili kuboresha wakati wa usindikaji na kutoa faili ndogo.

editor_save_dialog_save_by_google_drive.description: Upload to Google Drive & copy link
editor_save_dialog_save_by_google_drive.message: Pakia kwenye Hifadhi ya Google na Kiunga cha Nakili

editor_tip_delete_items.description: Pro tip: Delete added items by selecting the item and pressing the delete key.
editor_tip_delete_items.message: Pro Tip: Futa vitu vilivyoongezwa kwa kuchagua kipengee na kushinikiza ufunguo wa kufuta.

editor_tip_edit_specific_frames.description: Pro tip: You can edit specific frames by using the 'Apply edits to selected option'
editor_tip_edit_specific_frames.message: Kidokezo cha Pro: Unaweza kuhariri picha maalum kwa kutumia 'Maombi ya Matumizi kwa Chaguo Iliyochaguliwa'

editor_tip_scroll.description: Pro tip: Scroll when hovering the screenshot/recording to zoom.
editor_tip_scroll.message: PRO TIP: SCROLL wakati unapozunguka skrini / kurekodi ili kuvuta.

editor_tip_shift_multiple_items.description: Pro tip: When using the selecting tool hold down shift to select more than one item.
editor_tip_shift_multiple_items.message: TIP ya PRE: Wakati wa kutumia chombo cha kuchagua cha kushikilia chini ya kuchagua chaguo zaidi ya moja.

editor_tip_update_multiple_items.description: Pro tip: You can scale, rotate, move and delete multiple items at once.
editor_tip_update_multiple_items.message: Pro Tip: Unaweza kupanua, kuzunguka, kusonga na kufuta vitu vingi mara moja.

editor_tip_update_text.description: Pro tip: Double click on text to edit it.
editor_tip_update_text.message: Pro Tip: Bonyeza mara mbili kwenye maandishi ili uhariri.

editor_upload_dialog_alert_copy_failed_m.description: This may have occurred due to the window not being focused.
editor_upload_dialog_alert_copy_failed_m.message: Hii inaweza kuwa ilitokea kwa sababu ya dirisha halijalenga.

editor_upload_dialog_alert_upload_failed.description: Please make sure you are connected to the internet and have accepted Google Drive permissions.
editor_upload_dialog_alert_upload_failed.message: Tafadhali hakikisha umeunganishwa kwenye mtandao na umekubali ruhusa za Hifadhi ya Google.

editor_upload_dialog_link_public.description: Allow anyone with the link to view.
editor_upload_dialog_link_public.message: Ruhusu mtu yeyote aliye na kiunga cha kutazama.

enable_drawing_tooltip_text.description: This option allows users to draw in the selected area while holding down the ctrl key.
enable_drawing_tooltip_text.message: Chaguo hili linaruhusu watumiaji kuteka kwenye eneo lililochaguliwa wakati wa kushikilia ufunguo wa CTRL.

extension_description.description: Record gif or take screenshot of anything in your browser - quicker & easier than ever before.
extension_description.message: Rekodi GIF au kuchukua skrini ya kitu chochote katika kivinjari chako - haraka na rahisi zaidi kuliko hapo awali.

fullscreen_info_modal_continue.description: Are you sure you want to continue with full screen capture?
fullscreen_info_modal_continue.message: Una uhakika unataka kuendelea na kukamata skrini kamili?

fullscreen_info_modal_message.description: You have used a Chrome Capture shortcut without the cropping tool, this will capture in full screen mode.
fullscreen_info_modal_message.message: Umetumia njia ya mkato ya chrome bila chombo cha kukuza, hii itachukua katika hali kamili ya skrini.

fullscreen_info_modal_shortcut_cropping_.description: Alt + C: Open/close Chrome Capture cropping tool
fullscreen_info_modal_shortcut_cropping_.message: Alt + C: Open / Funga Chrome Capture Chombo cha Cropping

fullscreen_info_modal_shortcut_fullpage_.description: Alt + Shift + S: Full webpage screenshot (beta)
fullscreen_info_modal_shortcut_fullpage_.message: Alt + Shift + S: Full Webpage Screenshot (Beta)

fullscreen_info_modal_shortcut_screensho.message: Alt + S: Eneo la Eneo la Visivyoonekana

fullscreen_info_modal_shortcuts.message: Njia za mkato za msingi ni:

internet_connection_required.description: Internet connection is required to upgrade to premium.
internet_connection_required.message: Uunganisho wa intaneti unahitajika kuboresha kwa premium.

options_enable_notifications_tooltip.description: Display notifications when full screen recording starts and processing recordings in the background.
options_enable_notifications_tooltip.message: Onyesha arifa wakati rekodi kamili ya skrini inapoanza na rekodi za usindikaji nyuma.

overlay_help_text.description:
Click and drag to choose your selected area. 
Right click to snap to an element, hold shift for multiple.
overlay_help_text.message:
Bofya na Drag ili kuchagua eneo lako lililochaguliwa. 
 Bonyeza kubonyeza kwenye kipengele, ushikilie mabadiliko kwa nyingi.

popup_no_scripts_alert.description: Your browser does not allow running scripts on this webpage, unfortunately this makes selected area and full webpage capture impossible for this site.
popup_no_scripts_alert.message: Kivinjari chako haruhusu maandiko ya kuendesha kwenye ukurasa huu wa wavuti, kwa bahati mbaya hii inafanya eneo lililochaguliwa na ukurasa kamili wa wavuti hauwezekani kwa tovuti hii.

popup_recording_limit_alert.description: Record up to $SECONDS$ seconds per GIF. Premium users can update this from the
popup_recording_limit_alert.message: Rekodi hadi sekunde za $SECONDS$ kwa kila zawadi. Watumiaji wa premium wanaweza kusasisha hii kutoka kwa

purchase_description_text.description: You are currently on the free plan. Upgrade to Premium to unlock all premium features.
purchase_description_text.message: Kwa sasa una mpango wa bure. Kuboresha kwa Premium kufungua vipengele vyote vya premium.

purchase_title_text.description: Would you like to upgrade to premium?

purchases_compare_full_webpage_screensho.message: Viwambo vya skrini kamili vya ukurasa.

purchases_compare_recording.message: Rekodi za gif zisizo na ukomo.

purchases_compare_screenshots.message: Viwambo vya skrini usio na kikomo.

purchases_premium_feature_recording.message: Ukosefu wa ubora wa juu wa gif

rate_bad_rating_text.description: We are continuously trying our hardest to improve Chrome Capture, please share what needs improvement by emailing us at
rate_bad_rating_text.message: Tunaendelea kujaribu ngumu zaidi kuboresha Chrome Capture, tafadhali shiriki kile kinachohitaji kuboresha kwa barua pepe

rate_description_text.description:
If you've found this extension useful please leave a rating or review. 

By leaving a rating you can help us reach more users which will help fund continual improvements and keep general usage free.
rate_description_text.message:
Ikiwa umepata ugani huu unaofaa tafadhali tafadhali uondoe alama au ukaguzi. 

 Kwa kuacha rating unaweza kutusaidia kufikia watumiaji zaidi ambayo itasaidia kufadhili maboresho ya daima na kuweka matumizi ya jumla ya bure.

rate_description_text_purchased.description: We highly appreciate you purchasing premium and would love to hear any feedback you have to help us improve the product and reach more users.
rate_description_text_purchased.message: Tunathamini sana ununuzi wa premium na ungependa kusikia maoni yoyote unapaswa kutusaidia kuboresha bidhaa na kufikia watumiaji zaidi.

rate_good_rating_text.description: Your reviews keep our small team motivated to make Chrome Capture even better!
rate_good_rating_text.message: Mapitio yako yanaweka timu yetu ndogo inayohamasishwa kufanya chrome kukamata hata bora zaidi!

rate_good_rating_text_purchased.description: We highly appreciate you purchasing premium and would love to hear any feedback you have to help us improve the product and reach more users.
rate_good_rating_text_purchased.message: Tunathamini sana ununuzi wa premium na ungependa kusikia maoni yoyote unapaswa kutusaidia kuboresha bidhaa na kufikia watumiaji zaidi.

recorder_option_experimental_slow_text.description: Performant v2 - processing takes longer however it works for 4k screens and multiple monitors
recorder_option_experimental_slow_text.message: Usindikaji v2 - usindikaji inachukua muda mrefu hata hivyo inafanya kazi kwa skrini 4k na wachunguzi wengi

recorder_option_experimental_text.description: Performant - WARNING does not work for 4k screens or multiple monitors
recorder_option_experimental_text.message: Onyo - Onyo haifanyi kazi kwa skrini 4k au wachunguzi wengi

recorder_option_normal_text.description: Normal - if you experience performance issues use Performant
recorder_option_normal_text.message: Kawaida - ikiwa unapata masuala ya utendaji kutumia utendaji

show_click_indicator_tooltip_text.description: This option draws a circle animation around the click location.
show_click_indicator_tooltip_text.message: Chaguo hili huchota uhuishaji wa mzunguko karibu na eneo la click.

show_cursor_text.message: Onyesha DOT katika eneo la mshale.

show_cursor_tooltip_text.description: This option draws a small circle to indicate where the mouse is located.
show_cursor_tooltip_text.message: Chaguo hili huchota mduara mdogo kuonyesha ambapo panya iko.

unable_to_capture_website_alert.description:
Unable to capture this website. Please use full screen/application capture or try capture another website.

(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
unable_to_capture_website_alert.message:
Haiwezi kukamata tovuti hii. Tafadhali tumia kukamata skrini kamili/programu au jaribu kukamata tovuti nyingine. 

 (╯ ° □ °） ╯︵ ┻━┻
